name: The Seeker (itch) (gernermale)
description:
It was so dark and cold out there, and my childish mind still feared the creatures I couldn't see. I noticed a street lamp illuminating a sanctuary of safety. I lend against the pole and embraced the strange yet comforting warmth. As I was sitting under it, I noticed a strange grey blur in the distance, that kept coming closer and closer. When it was right in front of me, I wished I never stepped into that accursed light.

Controls:

WASD - Move,
Shift - Run,
Space - Jump, 
Ctrl - Crouch,
F - Toggle flashlight,
E - Interact
Escape - Open settings ingame
